info.name: LinkedIn Find Profile by VanityName API
info.description:
API to retrieve basic profile fields for a LinkedIn member by their vanity name.

**Note:** The use of this API is restricted to those developers approved by LinkedIn 
and subject to applicable data restrictions in their agreements.

The vanityName is used to represent the public profile URL in the format: 
www.linkedin.com/in/{vanityName}. Each LinkedIn profile has a unique vanityName.

**Usage Restrictions:**
- You cannot "browse members" by VanityNames
- Should only be used to identify profiles from known vanityNames for approved use cases
- Access to profile data is subject to the relevant members' privacy settings
- Application limit of 500 requests per day


Contact Support:
 Name: LinkedIn Developer Support

query.description: Query type parameter, must be set to "vanityName"
The vanity name of the LinkedIn member to retrieve

request.description:
Returns basic profile fields for the LinkedIn member that matches the vanityName.
Requires an access token for application authenticated call.

response.name: fullProfile

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: oauth2

The vanity name of the LinkedIn member to retrieve
